name: NightTerror
description:
Follow a young girl named Ashlynn as she awakes to her own nightmares. Explore a house. Deal with various creatures made from Ashlynn's own nightmares and decide whether she resolves them peacefully or removes them altogether. Can you escape what lurks within your own head?

Controls

WASD to move. Left click to attack with the dangerous pair of scissors. Right Click blocks with your protective teddy bear. Spacebar fires your magic wand at enemies.

Artists

  •  Cassy Shoemake 
  • Dreama Morrow
  • Kaleb Trahan 

Programmers  

  • Hunter Trahan
  • Seth Sylvester
